title: Just what i was looking for, and a bit more.
comment: It's just like the calculator already on my phone, but way better. I mainly got it because it was bothering me the calculator that was already on my phone didn't let calculate percentages and I wanted something as much like the calculator I already had. It works almost exactly the same, but with little changes here and there that make it easier to use and more features. For example it's easier to check your history of what you've calculated. More features so you now have more you can calculate with. Is this the most advanced calculator in existence? No, but I never wanted that. All I want is a basic calculator plus a little bit more. This does it extremely well. I love this app so much that I'm planning on getting the paid version which is exactly the same, but I want to support this excellent product.

title: A great start!
comment: This is a great start on a general purpose calculator! Good improvements would be greater control over graphing area (I like to look at probability distributions, but it's currently hard to get the graph to show just [0,1]), and more functions like n choose k. Also cool would be the ability to define a function; the Beta distribution isn't included by default, but if I could define the beta function myself, save it, and then call it, graphing tasks could be greatly simplified. It would also be nice to plot multiple functions, color-code them, etc..
